metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1056 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Read error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 46dc8fcd.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the fix for this CVE seems to be the same as the fix for CVE-2022-0891.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
